name: AtwistBreakout - Demo
description:
Classic breakout-style with a “crazy” twist, a different rule. 

You don't have to control by moving left/right anymore, USE [Right-click] to place the paddle at the right place, right moment.  Each time you place the paddle, your hp will decrease by 1.  

Controls:
- Use [Right-click] to place the paddle at the right place rong>Controls:
- Use [A] key for surprises!!

Soundtrack: End Credits [Loop] by Visager (CC-By)
